Posts.Title: Quick fix foods while on chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you for your advice, much appreciated  Take care
Posts.Title: Quick fix foods while on chemo

Posts.Content: Last Friday I had my first Dosataxel. I really don't know what to eat, have no real appetite. Feel weepy and quite fed up. I know this is part of the journey, but I just feel so awful. I know I must eat but have no energy or motivation to prepare food any suggestions please.
